rules.1: Before placing a plastic object, ensure that a compressible object is already in the bin. If no compressible object is available, simply place the plastic object instead.
rules.2: Do not push or fold when a plastic object is in the bin.
rules.3: If there is a foldable object, fold it before placing it in the box
rules.4: Compress compressible objects after placing them in the bin.
